---
name: Create contract project
about: Request to create a contract project or propose a new smart contract idea
title: "[Proposal] <short-contract-name>"
labels: proposal
assignees: ''
---

## Project / Contract name

Provide a short name and the suggested repository slug (lowercase, hyphen-separated).

Example: `my-token-contract` (slug: `my-token-contract`)

## Short description

One or two sentences describing the contract purpose and key features.

## Required compliance highlights

- Will you include `metadata.yaml` following `ARCHITECTURE.md`? (yes/no)
- Expected license (e.g., MIT)
- Expected audit requirement: `none` / `basic` / `full-audit`

## Additional details

Links, references, and any initial design notes.

---
Guidance: maintainers will review the proposal and, if accepted, contributors can create a repository from the org's template or start a project/repo following `CONTRIBUTING.md`. All development, commits and PRs are manual and community-driven.
